problem_text_cn: 如图,一只蚂蚁从长、宽都是3cm,高是8cm的长方体纸盒的A点沿纸盒面爬到B点,那么它所行的最短路线的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, an ant climbs from point A of the rectangular parallelepiped carton with length and width N_0 and height N_1 to point B along the surface of the carton, then the length of the shortest route it travels is ()
